body_html:
This just updated a stale comment, /device:FOO has been supported in the core codebase well before 1.0, though not all libraries have handled this form of the device name until more recently.

/gpu:0 and /cpu:0 will remain for the foreseeable future due to backwards compatibility, but new devices must use /device:$XPU:$id.

body:
This just updated a stale comment, /device:FOO has been supported in the core codebase well before 1.0, though not all libraries have handled this form of the device name until more recently.

/gpu:0 and /cpu:0 will remain for the foreseeable future due to backwards compatibility, but new devices must use /device:$XPU:$id.
